trans-unit.source: Create images in markdown
trans-unit.target: Create images in markdown

trans-unit.source: Explains how to create images in markdown according to guidelines set for the Azure repositories.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to create images in markdown according to guidelines set for the Azure repositories.

trans-unit.source: Create images in markdown
trans-unit.target: Create images in markdown

trans-unit.source: Image folder creation and link syntax
trans-unit.target: Image folder creation and link syntax

trans-unit.source: For a new article, you'll need to create a folder in the following location:
trans-unit.target: For a new article, you'll need to create a folder in the following location:

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: After you create the folder and added images to it, use the following syntax to create images in your article:
trans-unit.target: After you create the folder and added images to it, use the following syntax to create images in your article:

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: See [the markdown template](../markdown%20templates/markdown-template-for-new-articles.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: See [the markdown template](../markdown%20templates/markdown-template-for-new-articles.md) for an example.

trans-unit.source: The image reference links in this markdown template are designed to be at the bottom of the template.
trans-unit.target: The image reference links in this markdown template are designed to be at the bottom of the template.

trans-unit.source: Guidelines specific to azure.microsoft.com
trans-unit.target: Guidelines specific to azure.microsoft.com

trans-unit.source: Screenshots are currently encouraged if it's not possible to include repro steps.
trans-unit.target: Screenshots are currently encouraged if it's not possible to include repro steps.

trans-unit.source: Do write your content so that the content can stand without the screenshots if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Do write your content so that the content can stand without the screenshots if necessary.

trans-unit.source: Use the following guidelines when creating and including art files:
trans-unit.target: Use the following guidelines when creating and including art files:

trans-unit.source: Do not share art files across documents.
trans-unit.target: Do not share art files across documents.

trans-unit.source: Copy the file you need and add it to the media folder for your specific topic.
trans-unit.target: Copy the file you need and add it to the media folder for your specific topic.

trans-unit.source: Sharing between files is discouraged because it is easier to remove deprecated content and images which keeps the repo clean.
trans-unit.target: Sharing between files is discouraged because it is easier to remove deprecated content and images which keeps the repo clean.

trans-unit.source: .png files are highly preferred over other formats.
trans-unit.target: .png files are highly preferred over other formats.

trans-unit.source: Use red squares of the default width provided in Paint (5 px) to call attention to particular elements in screenshots.
trans-unit.target: Use red squares of the default width provided in Paint (5 px) to call attention to particular elements in screenshots.

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: This is an example of a red square used as a callout.
trans-unit.target: This is an example of a red square used as a callout.

trans-unit.source: Avoid whitespace on edges of screenshots.
trans-unit.target: Avoid whitespace on edges of screenshots.

trans-unit.source: If you crop a screenshot in a way that leaves white background at the edges, add a single pixel gray border around the image.
trans-unit.target: If you crop a screenshot in a way that leaves white background at the edges, add a single pixel gray border around the image.

trans-unit.source: If using Paint, use the lighter gray in the default color pallete (0xC3C3C3).
trans-unit.target: If using Paint, use the lighter gray in the default color pallete (0xC3C3C3).

trans-unit.source: If using some other graphic app, the RGB color is R195, G195, 195.
trans-unit.target: If using some other graphic app, the RGB color is R195, G195, 195.

trans-unit.source: You can easily add a gray border around an image in Visio--to do this, select the image, select Line, and ensure the the correct color is set, and then change the line weight to 1 1/2 pt.
trans-unit.target: You can easily add a gray border around an image in Visio--to do this, select the image, select Line, and ensure the the correct color is set, and then change the line weight to 1 1/2 pt.

trans-unit.source: Screenshots should have a 1-pixel-wide gray border so that white areas of the screenshot do not blur into the web page.
trans-unit.target: Screenshots should have a 1-pixel-wide gray border so that white areas of the screenshot do not blur into the web page.

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: This is an example of a gray border around whitespace.
trans-unit.target: This is an example of a gray border around whitespace.

trans-unit.source: Conceptual images with whitespace are allowed to not have a gray boder.
trans-unit.target: Conceptual images with whitespace are allowed to not have a gray boder.

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: This is an example of a conceptual image with whitespace and no gray border.
trans-unit.target: This is an example of a conceptual image with whitespace and no gray border.

trans-unit.source: Try not to make an image too wide.
trans-unit.target: Try not to make an image too wide.

trans-unit.source: Images will be automatically resized if they are too wide.
trans-unit.target: Images will be automatically resized if they are too wide.

trans-unit.source: However, the resizing sometimes causes fuzziness, so we recommend that you limit the width of your images to 780 px, and manually resize images before submission if necessary.
trans-unit.target: However, the resizing sometimes causes fuzziness, so we recommend that you limit the width of your images to 780 px, and manually resize images before submission if necessary.

trans-unit.source: Show command outputs in screenshots.
trans-unit.target: Show command outputs in screenshots.

trans-unit.source: If your article includes steps where the user is working within a shell, it's useful to show command output in screenshots.
trans-unit.target: If your article includes steps where the user is working within a shell, it's useful to show command output in screenshots.

trans-unit.source: In this case, restricting your shell width to about 72 characters generally ensures that your image will remain within the 780 px width guideline.
trans-unit.target: In this case, restricting your shell width to about 72 characters generally ensures that your image will remain within the 780 px width guideline.

trans-unit.source: Before taking a screenshot of output, resize the window so that just the relevant command and output is shown (optionally with a blank line on either side).
trans-unit.target: Before taking a screenshot of output, resize the window so that just the relevant command and output is shown (optionally with a blank line on either side).

trans-unit.source: Take whole screenshots of windows when possible.
trans-unit.target: Take whole screenshots of windows when possible.

trans-unit.source: When taking a screenshot of a browser window, resize your browser window to 780 px wide or less, and keep the height of the browser window as short as possible such that your application fits within the window.
trans-unit.target: When taking a screenshot of a browser window, resize your browser window to 780 px wide or less, and keep the height of the browser window as short as possible such that your application fits within the window.

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: This is an example of a browser window screenshot.
trans-unit.target: This is an example of a browser window screenshot.

trans-unit.source: Use caution with what information is revealed in screenshots.
trans-unit.target: Use caution with what information is revealed in screenshots.

trans-unit.source: Do not reveal internal company information or personal information.
trans-unit.target: Do not reveal internal company information or personal information.

trans-unit.source: In conceptual art or diagrams, use the official icons in the Cloud and Enterprise symbol and icon set.
trans-unit.target: In conceptual art or diagrams, use the official icons in the Cloud and Enterprise symbol and icon set.

trans-unit.source: A public set is available at http://aka.ms/CnESymbols.
trans-unit.target: A public set is available at http://aka.ms/CnESymbols.
